text.name: sys_description
text.text: The PS3 is a Sony console released in 2006, it succeeds the PlayStation 2 and competes with Microsoft's Xbox 360 and Nintendo's Wii. Designed as a digital entertainment center, the PlayStation 3 is part of the era of high definition television by integrating a Blu-ray player, a hard drive, HDMI connectivity and a WiFi connection. It has a 3.2 GHz CELL processor coupled to 256MB of XDR DRAM and a 500 MHz Nvidia RSX graphics processor coupled to 256MB of GDDR3. It displays 1080p, 720p, 1080i, 480p, 480i.
